channel.title: RonKJeffries tweets

item.description: @jonst0kes WRONG! 1000 percent WRONG. ;)

item.description:
Follow @hardmaru for solid info about AI, e.g. #stablediffusion a powerful text-to-image generation system. This field is advancing at the speed of light. It's a DEEP subject. #AI-viz

See also: https://t.co/bDa1FHm8L6

item.description: How has IOS 16 changed your life? Are you smiling more, feeling less stress? Me? I mainly use Pixel 6 so am deeply despondent: no Dynamic Island. Even worse, my OG iPhone SE doesn't get the new iOS release, but will still serve as podcast player & Apple News delivery device.
item.source:markdown: How has IOS 16 changed your life? Are you smiling more, feeling less stress? Me? I mainly use Pixel 6 so am deeply despondent: no Dynamic Island. Even worse, my OG iPhone SE doesn't get the new iOS release, but will still serve as podcast player & Apple News delivery device.

item.description:
If (like me...) you're interested in developments in the emerging AI enabled art, this may be of interest. #AI-viz

item.description:
A very readable story about NASA's ongoing Artemis project to return to the moon.

It's complicated.

Note Bene: follow @salazar_elin -- a damn good reporter, lovely prose. https://t.co/jSXL9ExYnW

item.description: @greengart I struggle to grasp how sensitive the receivers in the sky must be. I assume there's also some serious code magic, such as each character uses 2x or 3x the normal number of bits. Phone must also give a serious (!) signal boost vs. a standard SMS etc. message.
item.source:markdown: @greengart I struggle to grasp how sensitive the receivers in the sky must be. I assume there's also some serious code magic, such as each character uses 2x or 3x the normal number of bits. Phone must also give a serious (!) signal boost vs. a standard SMS etc. message.

item.description: @greengart I want to understand how this tech works. Assume it uses LEO satellites? Amazed any handset has adequate power to even send a text message.
item.source:markdown: @greengart I want to understand how this tech works. Assume it uses LEO satellites? Amazed any handset has adequate power to even send a text message.

item.description: Is it true that ALL Android phones are now obsolete? Can you imagine using a phone that doesn't have a Dynamic Island?

item.description: @mims Is this an indicator WSJ is running low on funds? How can you function with such old gear, especially without Dynamic Island & satellite emergency texting?
